name: part_013
file: tmp_ASACOCO LIVE NEWS on a Birthday？  #asacoco [SwodJntnYBg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Coco thanks the audience and celebrates her birthday.
Ending screen with birthday illustration and date.

subtitles.original: しわの分だけの幸せ
subtitles.english: Happiness for every wrinkle we share

subtitles.original: 二人で感じて生きていこうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's feel it together as we live on

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG もう一人じゃ生きていけねえよ
subtitles.english: Love song, I can't live alone anymore

subtitles.original: 側に居て当たり前と思ってたんだ
subtitles.english: I took it for granted that you'd be by my side

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG もう悲しませたりしねえよ
subtitles.english: Love song, I won't make you sad ever again

subtitles.original: 空に向けて俺は誓ったんだ
subtitles.english: I swore it to the sky

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG 下手くそな歌で愛を
subtitles.english: Love song, expressing love with this clumsy song

subtitles.original: 馬鹿な男が愛を歌おう
subtitles.english: This foolish man will sing of love

subtitles.original: 一生隣で生きていてくれよ
subtitles.english: Please stay by my side for the rest of my life

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG 何度でも 何度でも
subtitles.english: Love song, again and again

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG...
subtitles.english: Love song...

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG...
subtitles.english: Love song...

subtitles.original: 何でも話そう
subtitles.english: Let's talk about anything

subtitles.original: LOVE SONG... 約束しよう
subtitles.english: Love song... let's make a promise

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば 億千の星
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, a billion stars

subtitles.original: 一番光るお前がいる
subtitles.english: The brightest one is you

subtitles.original: 初めて一途になれたよ
subtitles.english: For the first time, I could be single-minded

subtitles.original: 夜空へ響け愛の歌
subtitles.english: Let the song of love echo through the night sky

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば 億千の星
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, a billion stars

subtitles.original: 一番光るお前が欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you, the one who shines the brightest

subtitles.original: 解き放たれた夜はもう二度と
subtitles.english: The nights we were set free will never again...

subtitles.original: 忘れない届け愛の歌
subtitles.english: I won't forget, let the love song reach you

subtitles.original: 皆さん、今日は来てくれて
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming today

subtitles.original: お誕生日をお祝いしてくれて
subtitles.english: and for celebrating my birthday with me.

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you so very much!

subtitles.original: ちゃんと歌えてたかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if I sang okay?

subtitles.original: まだお別れじゃないよ
subtitles.english: It's not time to say goodbye just yet.

subtitles.original: でも、また、今日は本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: But again, thank you so much for today!

subtitles.original: 誕生日おめでとう自分！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday to me!

subtitles.original: 6/17 HAPPY BIRTHDAY COCO
subtitles.english: 6/17 HAPPY BIRTHDAY COCO
